title: Place of work
h1: What address did you work at?
cannotFindAddress: I cannot find the address in the list

addressPostcode.invalid: Enter a valid postcode. For example, SW1 1AA
addressPostcode.required: Enter a postcode. For example, SW1 1AA

workAddress1.required: Enter the first line of the address you worked at - up to 100 characters
workAddress1.invalid: Enter a valid first line of the address you worked at - up to 100 characters

workAddress2.required: Enter the second line of the address you worked at - up to 50 characters
workAddress2.invalid: Enter a valid second line of the address you worked at - up to 50 characters

workAddressTown.required: Enter a town or city for the address you worked at - up to 50 characters
workAddressTown.invalid: Enter a valid town or city for the address you worked at - up to 50 characters

workAddressCountry.required: Enter a country for the address you worked at - up to 50 characters
workAddressCountry.invalid: Enter a valid country for the address you worked at - up to 50 characters

workAddressPostcode.required: Enter a postcode. For example, SW1 1AA
